  <div style="color: #999999; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; text-align: left;">
    <span>[[Cassandra_Configuration_and_Operation|Cassandra Configuration and Operation]]</span> : <span>[[Cassandra_Script_Files|Cassandra Script Files]]</span> : Disabling Assertions</div>
  <hr />
  <div style="color: #4F81BD; font-family: Calibri; font-size: 12pt; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 10pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0DF0HA">Disabling Assertions</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0CF0HA">The Java runtime option </span><span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">-ea</span> (or <span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">-enableassertions</span>) is used to enable diagnostic “assert” statements in Java applications. It is useful in development/debugging environments since additional internal checking is performed, but it has a small performance cost. It should be disabled in production environments to eliminate the performance cost. This can be done by simply removing the <span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">-ea</span> option in JVM options or replacing it with <span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">-da</span> (or <span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">disableassertions</span>). In both the Cassandra script files <span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">{doradus_home}/bin/doradus-cassandra.bat</span> and <span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">{cassandra_home}/bin/cassandra.bat,</span> assertions are declared in the <span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">set JAVA_OPTS</span> statement as shown below:</div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0BF0HA">set JAVA_OPTS=-ea^</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0AF0HA">...</span></div>
</div>
